summary: Product-minded frontend engineer focused on building resilient, accessible interfaces. Comfortable owning architecture, collaborating across disciplines, and turning ambiguous ideas into shipped features.

experience.summary: Owned the customer-facing platform, led the migration to a modern component library, and mentored a team of six engineers across three time zones.
Shipped real-time collaboration tooling in partnership with product, design, and research. Introduced testing practices that cut regression bugs by 40%.
Built and maintained marketing and internal tools for clients in travel and fintech, introducing performance budgets and shared UI primitives.

projects.details: Progressive web app surfacing wind, swell, and tide insights for coastal passages.
